verses.verse: Michtam <WH4387> of David <WH1732>. Preserve <WH8104> <WH8798> me, O 'Elohim <WH410>: for in thee do I put my trust <WH2620> <WH8804>.
O my soul, thou hast said <WH559> <WH8804> unto the YY <WH3068>, Thou art my YY <WH136>: my goodness <WH2896> extendeth not to thee;
But to the saints <WH6918> that <WH1992> are in the earth <WH776>, and to the excellent <WH117>, in whom is all my delight <WH2656>.

Their sorrows <WH6094> shall be multiplied <WH7235> <WH8799> that hasten <WH4116> <WH8804> after another <WH312> god: their drink offerings <WH5262> of blood <WH1818> will I not offer <WH5258> <WH8686>, nor <WH1077> take up <WH5375> <WH8799> their names <WH8034> into my lips <WH8193>.
The YY <WH3068> is the portion <WH4490> of mine inheritance <WH2506> and of my cup <WH3563>: thou maintainest <WH8551> <WH8802> my lot <WH1486>.
The lines <WH2256> are fallen <WH5307> <WH8804> unto me in pleasant <WH5273> places; yea, I have a goodly <WH8231> <WH8804> heritage <WH5159>.
I will bless <WH1288> <WH8762> the YY <WH3068>, who hath given me counsel <WH3289> <WH8804>: my reins <WH3629> also instruct <WH3256> <WH8765> me in the night seasons <WH3915>.
I have set <WH7737> <WH8765> the YY <WH3068> always <WH8548> before me: because he is at my right hand <WH3225>, I shall not be moved <WH4131> <WH8735>.
Therefore my heart <WH3820> is glad <WH8055> <WH8804>, and my glory <WH3519> rejoiceth <WH1523> <WH8799>: my flesh <WH1320> also shall rest <WH7931> <WH8799> in hope <WH983>.
For thou wilt not leave <WH5800> <WH8799> my soul <WH5315> in SH'ol <WH7585>; neither wilt thou suffer <WH5414> <WH8799> thine Holy One <WH2623> to see <WH7200> <WH8800> corruption <WH7845>.

Thou wilt shew <WH3045> <WH8686> me the path <WH734> of life <WH2416>: in thy presence <WH6440> is fulness <WH7648> of joy <WH8057>; at thy right hand <WH3225> there are pleasures <WH5273> for evermore <WH5331>.
